title: AI Startup Pitch Generator
description: Create a powerful prompt that generates a 2-minute investor pitch for an innovative AI startup. The goal is to persuade investors by highlighting the problem, your AI-driven solution, market size, and business potential.
scenario: You are a prompt engineer working on a new LLM-powered educational platform. Your task is to design the core prompt template that users will fill in to generate a high-impact, structured investor pitch for their AI business idea.
target_output_details: The generated output must be a well-structured pitch, clearly segmented with headings for the Problem, Solution, Market Opportunity, Revenue Model, and a Call to Investors. The tone must be visionary and confident.
input_data: None (The prompt should define all necessary parameters for the LLM to generate the output).
expected_output: A structured startup pitch that includes: Problem, Solution, Market Opportunity, Revenue Model, and Call to Investors.
example_prompt: Act as a visionary AI founder pitching to top venture capitalists. Write a 2-minute investor pitch for an AI platform that empowers small businesses to automate customer support while retaining a human-like experience.
example_output:
Problem: Small businesses lose customers due to slow or robotic customer support.

Solution: Our AI SupportMate uses emotional-intelligence-driven NLP to deliver instant, human-like responses 24/7.

Market Opportunity: $10B SMB automation market by 2026.

Revenue Model: Subscription SaaS with performance-based tiers.

Call to Investors: Join us in revolutionizing how AI connects businesses with their customers.
hints: Start by defining a relatable business challenge.
Clearly describe how your AI innovation solves it better than others.
Mention target market size or early traction to add credibility.
End with a strong investor call-to-action like 'Join us' or 'Be part of this AI revolution'.

ai_eval_criteria.clarity: Is the problem and solution clearly articulated?
ai_eval_criteria.relevance: Does it address a real market or investor need?
ai_eval_criteria.creativity: Is the solution innovative and well-positioned?
ai_eval_criteria.persuasiveness: Would an investor feel compelled to learn more?

title: AI Product Launch Campaign Prompt
description: Design a prompt that helps generate a complete go-to-market (GTM) launch strategy for a new AI-powered product. The output should include target audience definition, key messaging, marketing channels, and a launch timeline.
scenario: You are an AI marketing strategist working with a startup launching a new AI-driven productivity tool. Your task is to create a prompt that guides an LLM to produce a compelling and actionable product launch campaign plan.
target_output_details: The generated response must include clear sections — Target Audience, Value Proposition, Key Messaging, Marketing Channels, and Launch Timeline — with persuasive, actionable insights for each.
input_data: None (The prompt should include all necessary parameters for the LLM to craft a full campaign strategy).
expected_output: A structured AI product launch plan that includes: Target Audience, Value Proposition, Key Messaging, Marketing Channels, and Launch Timeline.
example_prompt: Act as a top-tier AI marketing strategist. Write a go-to-market campaign plan for an AI productivity assistant that helps remote teams automate project tracking and communication.
example_output:
Target Audience: Remote-first teams, freelancers, and tech startups.

Value Proposition: Automate project tracking and team communication with human-like AI assistance.

Key Messaging: 'Less chaos. More clarity. Powered by AI.'

Marketing Channels: LinkedIn ads, tech podcasts, influencer partnerships, and email drip campaigns.

Launch Timeline: Pre-launch (2 weeks) — teaser campaign; Launch (Day 0) — live demo + PR; Post-launch (1 month) — user stories and referral rewards.
hints: Define who you’re marketing to and why they care.
Create short, emotional taglines for messaging.
List 3–4 launch channels suitable for startups.
Outline a simple 3-phase timeline: pre-launch, launch, and post-launch.

ai_eval_criteria.clarity: Is the campaign plan logically structured and easy to follow?
ai_eval_criteria.relevance: Does it align with real-world marketing strategies?
ai_eval_criteria.strategic_depth: Does it show an understanding of audience behavior and channels?
ai_eval_criteria.creativity: Does the plan include unique, memorable messaging or ideas?

title: AI Ethics Policy Drafting Challenge
description: Create a prompt that helps generate an ethical AI policy for a tech organization. The goal is to ensure responsible AI development that aligns with fairness, transparency, and accountability principles.
scenario: You are an AI policy advisor at a global technology company. Your task is to design a prompt that enables an LLM to produce a well-structured, company-wide AI ethics policy that addresses key ethical dimensions while remaining practical and actionable.
target_output_details: The output should include sections on Fairness & Bias Mitigation, Transparency, Data Privacy, Accountability, and Continuous Monitoring. Each section must provide clear, actionable guidelines that could realistically be adopted by an organization.
input_data: None (The prompt should define all ethical and structural components for the LLM to generate the policy).
expected_output: A structured AI Ethics Policy with detailed guidelines under Fairness & Bias Mitigation, Transparency, Data Privacy, Accountability, and Continuous Monitoring.
example_prompt: Act as an AI ethics consultant. Draft an AI Ethics Policy for a tech company that develops AI tools for education. The policy should promote fairness, ensure user privacy, and outline accountability measures for ethical AI deployment.
example_output:
Fairness & Bias Mitigation: All AI models must undergo pre-launch bias audits and regular fairness testing.

Transparency: Provide explainable AI outputs and maintain open documentation of datasets and algorithms.

Data Privacy: Follow GDPR-like principles; ensure user consent and data anonymization.

Accountability: Establish a cross-functional AI ethics committee responsible for oversight and incident review.

Continuous Monitoring: Implement quarterly AI audits and update ethical standards as technology evolves.
hints: Define 4–5 pillars of ethical AI governance.
Include specific, realistic measures (e.g., audits, consent, explainability).
Balance between moral principles and actionable company policies.
Use clear, policy-style language (not academic).

ai_eval_criteria.clarity: Is the policy written in an understandable and professional tone?
ai_eval_criteria.ethical_rigor: Does it adequately address fairness, transparency, and accountability?
ai_eval_criteria.practicality: Can these guidelines be realistically implemented in an organization?
ai_eval_criteria.completeness: Does it cover all essential ethical aspects of AI governance?

title: AI-Powered Learning Assistant Design Prompt
description: Craft a prompt that generates a concept proposal for an AI-based personal learning assistant designed to help students or professionals master new skills efficiently using adaptive learning techniques.
scenario: You are an AI product designer working at an EdTech startup. Your task is to design a prompt that guides an LLM to create a detailed concept for an AI Learning Assistant — including its core features, personalization logic, learning methodology, and user engagement strategies.
target_output_details: The generated response should clearly outline sections such as Overview, Core Features, Personalization Logic, Learning Approach, and Engagement Strategy. The tone should be user-focused and innovative.
input_data: None (The prompt should define all parameters to allow the LLM to design the assistant concept).
expected_output: A detailed AI Learning Assistant concept divided into: Overview, Core Features, Personalization Logic, Learning Approach, and Engagement Strategy.
example_prompt: Act as a visionary EdTech product designer. Create a detailed concept for an AI Learning Assistant that helps users learn coding faster using personalized learning paths and gamified challenges.
example_output:
Overview: An AI-driven learning companion that personalizes education by understanding user goals, progress, and interests.

Core Features: Adaptive lesson recommendations, real-time feedback, AI chat tutoring, and progress analytics dashboard.

Personalization Logic: Uses learning history, difficulty analysis, and motivation tracking to tailor lessons dynamically.

Learning Approach: Blends microlearning, spaced repetition, and project-based learning with AI-guided hints.

Engagement Strategy: Daily challenges, skill-level badges, leaderboard rankings, and progress milestones to retain users.
hints: Think about how AI can adapt to different learners’ needs.
Focus on engagement mechanisms that sustain learning motivation.
Include both technical and psychological aspects (feedback, goals, rewards).
Keep the assistant’s tone supportive and encouraging.

ai_eval_criteria.clarity: Is the concept easy to understand and well-organized?
ai_eval_criteria.innovation: Does it present a unique or advanced idea for AI-assisted learning?
ai_eval_criteria.usability: Would real users find the assistant intuitive and helpful?
ai_eval_criteria.depth: Does it explore multiple facets like engagement, personalization, and pedagogy?

title: Simple AI Idea Generator
description: Create a prompt that helps generate a simple AI project idea anyone can understand and explain. The goal is to describe the idea clearly with problem, solution, and potential users.
scenario: You are a beginner-friendly AI coach. Your task is to make a prompt that guides an LLM to produce easy-to-understand AI project ideas suitable for students or newcomers.
target_output_details: The output should include: Problem, AI Solution, and Target Users. The language must be simple and clear.
input_data: None (The prompt should include all instructions for the LLM to generate the idea).
expected_output: A short, easy-to-understand AI project idea with: Problem, AI Solution, Target Users.
example_prompt: Act as a beginner AI mentor. Suggest a simple AI project idea for students that solves an everyday problem.
example_output:
Problem: Students forget to water their plants on time.

AI Solution: A small app with AI reminders that suggest when and how much to water each plant.

Target Users: Students and plant lovers at home.
hints: Keep sentences short and simple.
Focus on everyday problems.
Explain the AI solution in one or two sentences.
Identify clearly who will benefit from the solution.

ai_eval_criteria.clarity: Is the idea clearly understandable?
ai_eval_criteria.simplicity: Can a beginner grasp the concept easily?
ai_eval_criteria.relevance: Does it address a real problem?
ai_eval_criteria.creativity: Is the solution slightly creative and engaging?

title: Personalized Learning Module Creator
description: Design a prompt that generates a personalized learning module for students on a given topic. The module should include key concepts, examples, exercises, and a short quiz to reinforce learning.
scenario: You are a prompt engineer working on an AI-powered education platform. Your goal is to create a template that allows the system to produce structured, engaging, and adaptive learning content based on the learner’s level and preferences.
target_output_details: The output should be divided into sections: Introduction, Key Concepts, Examples, Practice Exercises, and Quiz. The tone should be friendly, clear, and encouraging.
input_data: Topic name, student level (beginner, intermediate, advanced), preferred learning style (text/video/interactive).
expected_output: A structured learning module tailored to the student’s level and preferences, including examples and exercises.
example_prompt: Act as a personalized learning assistant. Create a beginner-friendly module on 'Photosynthesis' with examples, exercises, and a 5-question quiz.
example_output:
Introduction: Photosynthesis is the process by which plants make food using sunlight.

Key Concepts: Chlorophyll, Light Reactions, Calvin Cycle.

Examples: How a sunflower uses sunlight.

Practice Exercises: Label the parts of a leaf diagram.

Quiz: Q1. What is the main pigment in photosynthesis? A) Chlorophyll...
hints: Include step-by-step explanation for beginners.
Use examples relatable to daily life.
Design exercises to test understanding effectively.

ai_eval_criteria.clarity: Is the explanation easy to understand?
ai_eval_criteria.relevance: Does it cover the core topic appropriately?
ai_eval_criteria.creativity: Are examples and exercises engaging?

title: Social Media Marketing Copy Generator
description: Create a prompt that generates a series of engaging social media posts for a new product launch. The goal is to attract followers, increase engagement, and promote the product effectively.
scenario: You are a prompt engineer working for a brand launching an eco-friendly gadget. Your task is to design a template that produces catchy and persuasive social media content across multiple platforms.
target_output_details: Output should include 3-5 social media posts with captions, hashtags, and calls to action. Tone should be fun, persuasive, and brand-aligned.
input_data: Product name, product category, target audience, key benefits.
expected_output: Multiple ready-to-post social media messages tailored for the target audience with effective engagement hooks.
example_prompt: Act as a social media marketer. Generate 3 Instagram posts promoting an eco-friendly water bottle for millennials emphasizing style, sustainability, and usability.
example_output:
Post 1: Stay hydrated, stay green! Our eco-bottle is 100% recyclable 🌿 #EcoStyle #StayHydrated
Post 2: Sip sustainably. Reduce plastic, save the planet 🌎 #EcoFriendly #SustainableLiving
Post 3: Your perfect companion for workouts & travel 🚴‍♂️ #EcoBottle #OnTheGo
hints: Use catchy, relatable language.
Include trending hashtags relevant to the product.
Highlight unique product features creatively.

ai_eval_criteria.clarity: Is the message easy to understand?
ai_eval_criteria.relevance: Does it match the product and audience?
ai_eval_criteria.creativity: Are posts original and engaging?
ai_eval_criteria.persuasiveness: Would it encourage clicks or purchases?

title: Code Debugging Assistant
description: Design a prompt that helps generate a detailed debugging explanation and fixed code for a given programming snippet. The goal is to teach users why the code fails and how to correct it.
scenario: You are a prompt engineer building an AI coding tutor. Your task is to create a prompt template that users can input buggy code and receive a detailed fix with explanations.
target_output_details: Output should include: Error identification, line-by-line explanation, corrected code, and tips to avoid similar bugs in the future.
input_data: Buggy code snippet, programming language.
expected_output: Corrected code snippet along with a clear explanation of what was wrong and how to fix it.
example_prompt:
You are an AI coding tutor. Analyze the following Python code snippet that throws a TypeError and provide a fixed version along with explanations:

`print('Result: ' + 5)`
example_output:
Error Identification: TypeError due to string concatenation with integer.
Explanation: You cannot concatenate str and int directly in Python.
Corrected Code: print('Result: ' + str(5))
Tips: Always convert non-string types to string before concatenation.
hints: Focus on clear stepwise explanations.
Identify the root cause of the bug.
Provide practical tips for learners to avoid similar issues.

ai_eval_criteria.clarity: Is the explanation clear and easy to follow?
ai_eval_criteria.relevance: Does it accurately identify the bug?
ai_eval_criteria.creativity: Does the explanation engage and teach effectively?
ai_eval_criteria.educational_value: Does it help the user learn and improve?

title: Children’s Story Creator
description: Design a prompt that generates a short, easy-to-read story for children aged 6–10. The story should have a moral lesson and engaging characters.
scenario: You are a prompt engineer building an AI storytelling tool for kids. Your task is to create a prompt template that produces fun and educational stories.
target_output_details: The output should have a clear beginning, middle, and end, with a moral at the end. Tone should be friendly and fun.
input_data: Story theme (e.g., friendship, honesty), preferred character types (animal, human, fantasy).
expected_output: A short children’s story with clear moral and engaging characters.
example_prompt: Create a story for kids about friendship featuring a talking rabbit and a squirrel.
example_output:
Beginning: Rabbit and Squirrel lived in the same forest and often argued.
Middle: One day, they got lost together and had to help each other.
End: They safely returned home, realizing teamwork is important.
Moral: True friends help each other in need.
hints: Keep sentences short and simple.
Use relatable characters for kids.
Always include a moral lesson.

ai_eval_criteria.clarity: Is the story easy for children to understand?
ai_eval_criteria.relevance: Does it match the theme provided?
ai_eval_criteria.creativity: Are characters and plot interesting?

title: Short Poem Writer
description: Generate a simple 4-line poem on a given topic suitable for beginners or students.
scenario: You are a prompt engineer for a creative AI writing assistant. Design a template for generating short, easy-to-understand poems.
target_output_details: The output should be 4 lines, rhyming if possible, with clear imagery and simple language.
input_data: Poem topic (e.g., nature, friendship, happiness).
expected_output: A short 4-line poem matching the topic.
example_prompt: Write a 4-line poem about happiness for beginners.
example_output:
Line 1: Sunshine warms the smiling face,
Line 2: Gentle breeze in open space.
Line 3: Laughter echoes everywhere,
Line 4: Joy is simple, light, and fair.
hints: Keep vocabulary simple.
Use clear imagery.
Rhyming is optional but adds charm.

ai_eval_criteria.clarity: Are lines easy to understand?
ai_eval_criteria.relevance: Does the poem match the topic?
ai_eval_criteria.creativity: Are metaphors or imagery imaginative?
ai_eval_criteria.engagement: Is the poem enjoyable to read?

title: Daily Habit Tracker Template
description: Generate a simple daily habit tracker table for a user to track 3–5 habits over a week.
scenario: You are designing a prompt for an AI productivity assistant. The goal is to generate a ready-to-use table or checklist for habit tracking.
target_output_details: Output should be a table with days of the week and space to track each habit. Include a motivational note.
input_data: Habits to track (list of 3–5), user name (optional).
expected_output: A formatted weekly habit tracker table with habits and days labeled.
example_prompt: Generate a weekly habit tracker for 'Exercise', 'Read', and 'Meditate'.
example_output:
Habit Tracker for the Week:
Habit 1: Exercise [Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu, Fri, Sat, Sun]
Habit 2: Read [Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu, Fri, Sat, Sun]
Habit 3: Meditate [Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu, Fri, Sat, Sun]
Keep going, you’re doing great!
hints: Keep table simple and easy to fill.
Add motivational note at the end.
Include all days of the week.

ai_eval_criteria.clarity: Is the table easy to use?
ai_eval_criteria.relevance: Are all habits included?
ai_eval_criteria.creativity: Is the layout clear and visually simple?
ai_eval_criteria.engagement: Does it motivate the user to track habits?

title: Simple Recipe Generator
description: Generate a short, easy-to-follow recipe for beginners with 3–5 steps.
scenario: You are a prompt engineer creating an AI cooking assistant. Design a template for generating beginner-friendly recipes.
target_output_details: Output should include ingredients, stepwise instructions, and estimated cooking time.
input_data: Dish name, main ingredient, cuisine type.
expected_output: A beginner-friendly recipe with ingredients list and 3–5 simple steps.
example_prompt: Generate a simple pasta recipe for beginners using tomatoes and cheese.
example_output:
Ingredients: Pasta, Tomatoes, Cheese, Olive oil, Salt
Step 1: Boil pasta.
Step 2: Prepare tomato sauce.
Step 3: Mix pasta with sauce and cheese.
Step 4: Serve warm.
hints: Use simple, easy-to-follow steps.
Include approximate quantities.
Focus on beginner-friendly cooking techniques.

ai_eval_criteria.clarity: Are the steps easy to follow?
ai_eval_criteria.relevance: Does it match the dish requested?
ai_eval_criteria.creativity: Are the instructions clear and concise?
ai_eval_criteria.usability: Can a beginner easily make the dish?

title: Simple Workout Plan Generator
description: Create a basic 5-day workout plan for beginners.
scenario: You are a prompt engineer designing an AI fitness assistant. Your task is to generate a simple, beginner-friendly workout plan.
target_output_details: Output should include daily exercises with repetitions or duration and a motivational note.
input_data: Fitness goal (strength, cardio, flexibility), user fitness level.
expected_output: A 5-day workout plan suitable for beginners with simple instructions.
example_prompt: Create a beginner-friendly 5-day workout plan focused on cardio.
example_output:
Day 1: 10-min brisk walk, 10 squats, 5 push-ups
Day 2: 15-min jogging, 10 lunges
Day 3: Rest
Day 4: 10-min cycling, 5 push-ups
Day 5: 10-min yoga stretches
Keep going, consistency is key!
hints: Keep exercises simple and safe for beginners.
Include rest or light days.
Motivate the user at the end.

ai_eval_criteria.clarity: Are exercises and durations clear?
ai_eval_criteria.relevance: Does it match the fitness goal?
ai_eval_criteria.creativity: Is it varied and beginner-friendly?
ai_eval_criteria.engagement: Would it motivate a user to follow the plan?

title: Simple Travel Itinerary Generator
description: Generate a 3-day travel itinerary for a popular city, highlighting top attractions and meals.
scenario: You are a prompt engineer building an AI travel assistant. Create a prompt template to generate beginner-friendly itineraries.
target_output_details: Output should list daily activities, attractions, suggested meals, and tips for travelers.
input_data: City name, travel preferences (sightseeing, food, culture).
expected_output: A clear, concise, 3-day travel plan tailored to the user’s preferences.
example_prompt: Generate a 3-day sightseeing itinerary for Paris with food recommendations.
example_output:
Day 1: Visit Eiffel Tower, Lunch at local café, Seine River cruise
Day 2: Louvre Museum, Picnic at Tuileries Garden
Day 3: Montmartre walk, Try French pastries at bakery
Tips: Buy museum tickets online to skip queues.
hints: Keep plan simple and doable in 3 days.
Include travel and meal suggestions.
Focus on popular attractions.

ai_eval_criteria.clarity: Is the itinerary easy to follow?
ai_eval_criteria.relevance: Does it match city and preferences?
ai_eval_criteria.creativity: Are suggestions appealing and practical?
ai_eval_criteria.engagement: Would it excite a traveler to follow?

title: Simple Email Template Generator
description: Create a beginner-friendly email template for professional communication.
scenario: You are a prompt engineer designing an AI writing assistant. Your task is to generate professional email templates for common use cases.
target_output_details: Output should include subject line, greeting, body, and closing.
input_data: Email purpose (e.g., thank you, meeting request, apology).
expected_output: A complete email template ready to use for the specified purpose.
example_prompt: Generate a professional email template to request a meeting with a client.
example_output:
Subject: Meeting Request
Greeting: Dear [Client Name],
Body: I hope this message finds you well. I would like to schedule a meeting to discuss [topic] at your convenience. Please let me know your available times.
Closing: Best regards, [Your Name]
hints: Use polite and professional tone.
Keep language simple and concise.
Clearly define purpose of email.

ai_eval_criteria.clarity: Is the email understandable?
ai_eval_criteria.relevance: Does it match the purpose?
ai_eval_criteria.creativity: Is the phrasing polite and professional?

title: Simple Quiz Generator
description: Generate a 5-question multiple-choice quiz for beginners on a given topic.
scenario: You are a prompt engineer building an AI education tool. Your task is to create a prompt that generates a beginner-level quiz.
target_output_details: Output should include question, 4 answer options, and the correct answer for each question.
input_data: Topic name, difficulty level (easy).
expected_output: A 5-question multiple-choice quiz with answers.
example_prompt: Generate a 5-question beginner-level quiz on 'Solar System'.
example_output:
Q1: Which planet is closest to the Sun? A) Earth B) Mercury C) Venus D) Mars (Answer: B)
Q2: ...
hints: Keep questions simple and relevant.
Include 4 options with only one correct answer.
Focus on beginner-level knowledge.

ai_eval_criteria.clarity: Are questions understandable?
ai_eval_criteria.relevance: Do questions match the topic?
ai_eval_criteria.creativity: Are examples clear and simple?

title: Simple Reminder Message Generator
description: Generate a short, friendly reminder message for daily tasks or events.
scenario: You are a prompt engineer building an AI productivity assistant. Your task is to generate short reminders in an easy-to-read format.
target_output_details: Output should be a concise reminder with friendly tone and suggested action.
input_data: Task or event description, time, recipient name (optional).
expected_output: A clear, friendly reminder message ready to send.
example_prompt: Generate a reminder message for 'Doctor Appointment at 5 PM'.
example_output: Hi! Just a friendly reminder that you have a doctor appointment at 5 PM today. Don't forget to take your ID and insurance card!
hints: Keep tone friendly and concise.
Include key details like time and task.
Optional personalization with recipient name.

ai_eval_criteria.clarity: Is the reminder easy to understand?
ai_eval_criteria.relevance: Does it include all essential details?
ai_eval_criteria.creativity: Is the message polite and friendly?
ai_eval_criteria.engagement: Would the recipient notice and act on it?

title: Simple Joke Generator
description: Generate a short, clean joke suitable for kids or a general audience.
scenario: You are a prompt engineer designing an AI humor assistant. Create a prompt to generate beginner-friendly jokes.
target_output_details: Output should include a single joke with setup and punchline.
input_data: Topic or theme (optional).
expected_output: A short, funny joke suitable for the audience.
example_prompt: Generate a clean joke about animals.
example_output:
Setup: Why did the cow go to space?
Punchline: To see the moooon!
hints: Keep language simple.
Ensure joke is appropriate for all ages.
Include a clear setup and punchline.

ai_eval_criteria.clarity: Is the joke easy to understand?
ai_eval_criteria.relevance: Does it match the topic?
ai_eval_criteria.creativity: Is it funny and original?
ai_eval_criteria.humor: Would it make the audience laugh?

title: Simple Daily Affirmation Generator
description: Generate a positive daily affirmation message to motivate users.
scenario: You are a prompt engineer creating an AI wellness assistant. Your task is to generate beginner-friendly affirmations.
target_output_details: Output should be a single, concise, positive message suitable for daily reading.
input_data: User mood or goal (optional).
expected_output: A motivational daily affirmation message.
example_prompt: Generate a daily affirmation for confidence.
example_output: I am confident and capable of achieving my goals today.
hints: Keep message short and positive.
Focus on motivation and self-belief.
Optional personalization with user goal.

ai_eval_criteria.clarity: Is the affirmation easy to understand?
ai_eval_criteria.relevance: Does it suit the goal or mood?
ai_eval_criteria.creativity: Is it inspiring and fresh?

title: Simple Weather Update Generator
description: Generate a brief, easy-to-read daily weather update message.
scenario: You are a prompt engineer designing an AI weather assistant. The goal is to produce clear, concise weather updates for general users.
target_output_details: Output should include temperature, conditions, and simple advice (e.g., bring umbrella).
input_data: City name, date (optional).
expected_output: A concise weather update message ready to send.
example_prompt: Generate a daily weather update for London.
example_output: Weather Update: Today in London, it will be 18°C with light rain. Carry an umbrella and wear a light jacket.
hints: Keep message concise.
Include temperature and conditions.
Provide simple actionable advice.

ai_eval_criteria.clarity: Is the message clear and understandable?
ai_eval_criteria.relevance: Does it accurately reflect the city weather?
ai_eval_criteria.creativity: Is the advice practical?
ai_eval_criteria.engagement: Would users read and act on it?

title: Simple Motivational Quote Generator
description: Generate a short, inspirational motivational quote for daily encouragement.
scenario: You are a prompt engineer building an AI wellness assistant. Create a prompt template that generates concise, motivational quotes without additional context.
target_output_details: Output should be a single, easy-to-read motivational quote suitable for general users.
input_data: None (zero-shot, the model should generate a quote without extra input).
expected_output: A concise, motivational quote that encourages positive thinking.
example_prompt: Generate a motivational quote to inspire positivity.
example_output: Quote: Every small step forward brings you closer to your dreams.
hints: Keep the quote short and clear.
Focus on positive, encouraging language.
No examples or prior context needed.

ai_eval_criteria.clarity: Is the quote easy to read and understand?
ai_eval_criteria.relevance: Does it fit the motivational theme?
ai_eval_criteria.creativity: Is the quote original and inspiring?

title: Simple Joke Generator
description: Generate a clean, funny joke suitable for kids or general audience without any examples.
scenario: You are designing a zero-shot AI humor assistant. The AI should generate a joke without prior instructions or context.
target_output_details: Output should include a setup and punchline, short and funny.
input_data: None (zero-shot).
expected_output: A short, clean joke with setup and punchline.
example_prompt: Generate a clean zero-shot joke about animals.
example_output:
Setup: Why did the chicken join the band?
Punchline: Because it had the drumsticks!
hints: Keep the joke short and simple.
Ensure it’s appropriate for all ages.
No examples or extra input required.

ai_eval_criteria.clarity: Is the joke understandable?
ai_eval_criteria.relevance: Does it match the zero-shot instruction?
ai_eval_criteria.creativity: Is it funny and original?
ai_eval_criteria.humor: Would it make the audience laugh?

title: Medium-Level Travel Tip Generator
description: Generate practical travel tips for first-time travelers to any city without context or examples.
scenario: You are a prompt engineer designing a zero-shot AI travel assistant. The AI should provide useful travel advice using only general knowledge.
target_output_details: Output should be 3–5 concise travel tips for beginners.
input_data: None (zero-shot).
expected_output: A list of beginner-friendly travel tips.
example_prompt: Provide zero-shot travel tips for someone visiting Paris for the first time.
example_output:
Tip 1: Always carry a map or offline GPS.
Tip 2: Learn basic local phrases.
Tip 3: Keep valuables secure.
Tip 4: Try local food, but be cautious with street vendors.
Tip 5: Plan key attractions to avoid wasting time.
hints: Provide clear, practical advice.
Focus on beginner traveler needs.
No examples or city-specific context needed.

ai_eval_criteria.clarity: Are the tips easy to understand?
ai_eval_criteria.relevance: Do they help first-time travelers?
ai_eval_criteria.creativity: Are the tips practical and thoughtful?
ai_eval_criteria.usefulness: Would a traveler benefit from them?

title: Medium-Level Productivity Hack Generator
description: Generate 3–5 productivity hacks for working professionals without prior context.
scenario: You are a prompt engineer designing a zero-shot AI productivity assistant. The AI should create practical hacks using only general knowledge.
target_output_details: Output should be a concise list of productivity tips applicable to most users.
input_data: None (zero-shot).
